Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Kilbourn
ShortDescription: #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Pulaski, 59th & Midway Orange Line Terminal, due to street blockage near 63rd/Kilbourn

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Pulaski, 59th and Midway Orange Line, Terminal then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 63rd/Kilbourn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing near Garfield track conditions. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing near Garfield track conditions.

At this time, also consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
